table.name: vtiger_rsnbanques
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnbanques` ( `rsnbanquesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `codebanque` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `shortname` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `disabled` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnbanquesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_rsnbanquescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnbanquescf` ( `rsnbanquesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnbanquesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
